verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: ruled] out [ARG1: using the Korean DMZ as the site for an upcoming nuclear summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] ruled out [V: using] [ARG1: the Korean DMZ] [ARG2: as the site for an upcoming nuclear summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un] .
